apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji between a woman with medium-dark skin tone and another woman with no specified skin tone, as seen on Apple devices, captures a moment of intimate affection with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Realistic lighting accentuates the gentle press of their lips and the soft, rounded contours of their faces, conveying a sense of tenderness. This emoji on Apple devices represents romantic love and partnership, offering a warm and inclusive way to express romantic feelings between women.
